newsitem.title: USA: Platinum Software sues Platinum Technology.
newsitem.headline: Platinum Software sues Platinum Technology.

text.p: Platinum Software Corp said Tuesday that it filed suit in U.S. District Court for the Central District of California against Platinum Technology Inc of Chicago.
Platinum Technology could not be reached for comment.
The suit alleges trademark infringement of Platinum Software's registered trademark by Platinum Technology.

In the suit, Platinum Software said it is seeking damages for trademark infringement, an injunction against Platinum Technology preventing it from using the word "Platinum" in connection with computer software and hardware, as well as certain declaratory relief against Platinum Technology.

Platinum Software said it claims that Platinum Technology's product branding, internet domain name, and marketing materials are confusingly similar to Platinum Software's Platinum mark and have caused confusion in the market with potential customers, business partners, industry and financial analysts, and others.
